quack.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make the sound a duck makes
quack.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: someone who pretends to be a doctor – used to show disapproval
quack.translation[1].definitions[2].exam: You’d better go and see the quack with that burn.
quack.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: relating to the activities or medicines of someone who pretends to be a doctor
